channel.title: translation on OJ's Perspective
channel.description: Recent content in translation on OJ's Perspective

item.title: Assembly Signing Article Translated into Italian
item.description: You may remember a little while ago I wrote a post on signing assemblies that you don’t have the source code to. It got a bit of attention and was reproduced in full on dzone’s dotnet site. That was pretty exciting. This, however, I find more exciting. This article has now been translated into Italian! This is the first time an article of mine has been reproduced in another language, which I think is just fantastic.
